Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenNotBound
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the token provided is not bound with the device.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenPending
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the token provided is in the pending state.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenDeclined
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the token provided is in a declined state.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: tokenAlreadyBound
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the token provided is already bounded with the device or pending activation.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidConfigParams
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when some of the TMGClientConfiguration parameters are invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidRequiredParams
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when some of the mandatory parameters on this API are invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidIdvMethod
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the IDV method provided is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: invalidOTPMessage
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the OTP provided is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: issuerAuthenticationRequired
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the issuer authentication is required. Use the IDVSession.selectIDVMethod(...) function.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: biometricNotSupported
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the biometrics are not enrolled on the device.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: authenticationFailure(reason:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the end user authentication is failing. Check the reason message for the error.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: authenticationKeyInvalidated
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the end user changes the biometrics to be used for the authentication. For example, the end user changes the biometrics (faceId or fingerprint) on the device.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: internalError(additionalMessage:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when an internal error occurs. Check the additional message for the error.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: deviceEnvironmentUnsafe(code:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the device environment is potentially unsafe. Check the error by looking at the obfuscated error code.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverIsNotAccessible
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the server is not accesible due to network connection issue.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverRetryable
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the server is unable to handle the current request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverError(httpStatusCode:additionalMessage:)
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when there is a server error. Check the the error by looking at the HTTP status code and the additional message; if any.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorTooManyRequest
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when there are too many requests on the server. Please try it again later.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorCryptoError
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when there is an error when performing the crypto operation on the server.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorInvalidTokenState
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the token state is invalid.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorIdvNotAvailable
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the end user selects an IDV method that is not available.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorNoSessionFound
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the session cannot be found.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorWrongOTP
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the end user enters an incorrect OTP.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorExpiredOTP
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the end user enters an expired OTP.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: serverErrorRetryLimitExceeded
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: This is returned when the end user exceeds the number of retries allowed.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: description
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Description of the TMGError.

Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.name: errorDescription
Enums/TMGError.html#/s:6TMGSDK8TMGErrorO.abstract: Returned the error description.

Enums/TMGError.html.name: TMGError
Enums/TMGError.html.abstract: An error object that is returned when there is a problem in the process.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVSession.html#/s.name: selectIDVMethod(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVSession.html#/s.abstract: Selects the IDV method for the Visa Token Binding process.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVSession.html#/s.name: activateBinding(withValue:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVSession.html#/s.abstract: Activate Binding with or without OTP. If OTP is provided, the TMGSDK will call the server to validate it.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.name: otpEmail
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.abstract: This code is used when the end user opts for OTP verification through mail.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.name: otpSMS
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.abstract: This code is used when the end user opts for OTP verification through SMS.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.name: otpOnlineBanking
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.abstract: This code is used when the end user opts for OTP verification through online banking.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.name: appToApp
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.abstract: This code is used when the end user opts for app-to-app verification.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.name: customerService
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.abstract: This code is used when the end user opts to verify with customer service support.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.name: outboundCall
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html#/s:6T.abstract: This code is used when the end user opts to verify through outbound call.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.name: maxOTPRequestsAllowed
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.abstract: This is only provided if the selected IDVMethod contains an OTP. This defines the number of retries the end user can enter the OTP before requesting a new one.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.name: maxOTPVerificationAllowed
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.abstract: This is only provided if the selected IDVMethod contains an OTP. The number of times the end user can request a new OTP for a token. After the number of attempts is exceeded, the step-up authentication via OTP is disabled for this token.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.name: otpExpiration
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.abstract: This is only provided if the selected IDVMethod contains an OTP. OTP validation will fail if the end user submits OTP after this period. The value is set in minutes.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html#.name: bound
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html#.abstract: This is returned when vProvisionedTokenID is bound with the device.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html#.name: pendingActivation
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html#.abstract: This is returned when an activation is pending for vProvisionedTokenID.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html#.name: unbound
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html#.abstract: This is returned when vProvisionedTokenID is not bound with the device.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.name: type
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.abstract: A type of IDVMethod that the end user can select.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.name: value
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.abstract: Only for IDVType.appToApp. It corresponds to the concatenation of the issuer application ID and the intent handler.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.name: source
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.abstract: Only for IDVType.appToApp. It corresponds to the concatenation of the issuer application ID and the intent handler.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.name: requestPayload
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html#/s:.abstract: Only for IDVType.appToApp. An opaque data that is sent to the issuer application.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.name: createBinding(forVProvisionedTokenID:correlationID:deviceAuthenticationHandler:idvSessionHandler:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.abstract: This API binds the Visa token to the device.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.name: resumeBinding(forVProvisionedTokenID:idvSessionHandler:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.abstract: Continue with the token which is pending for activation.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.name: bindingState(forVProvisionedTokenID:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.abstract: Retrieves the binding status of a Visa provisioned token ID.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.name: authenticateTransaction(forVProvisionedTokenID:deviceAuthenticationHandler:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.abstract: Authenticates a transaction for a specified Visa provisioned token ID.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.name: removeBinding(forVProvisionedTokenID:correlationID:completionHandler:)
Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html#/s:6TMGSDK13V.abstract: Removes the specified Visa provisioned token ID from the device.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html.name: IDVMethod
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVMethod.html.abstract: IDVMethod defines the Visa IDV method that is available to the end user.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html.name: BindingState
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/BindingState.html.abstract: The BindingState enum defines the current state of the vProvisionedTokenID parameter.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.name: OTPActivationStatus
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/OTPActivationStatu.abstract: The OTPActivationStatus struct captures the OTP status during selectIDVMethod and sends it to the application.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html.name: IDVType
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVType.html.abstract: The list of Identity and Verification method types in IDVType.

Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVSession.html.name: IDVSession
Classes/VisaCTFHelper/IDVSession.html.abstract: IDVSession is used to get the available IDVMethod.

Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: serverCertificate
Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Get the certificate used for Public key generation during communication with TMG Server.

Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html#/s:6.name: init(serverURL:serverCertificate:serverKeyID:)
Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html#/s:6.abstract: Initializing the tmgUrl, certificate, and key identifier for TMGClientConfiguration

Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.name: createVisaCTFHelper(withConfiguration:)
Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.abstract: Creates a Visa Token Binding Client with the given configuration.

Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.name: createMastercardTAFHelper(withConfiguration:)
Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.abstract: Creates Mastercard Token Binding Client with the given configuration.

Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.name: secureLog
Classes/TMGClient.html#/s:6TMGSDK9TMGCli.abstract: The protocol contains all functions to the app integrators to interact with SecureLog.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/TransactionC.name: merchantName
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/TransactionC.abstract: merchantName Name of merchant which making transaction.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/BindingState.name: bound
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/BindingState.abstract: This is returned when tokenId is bound with the device.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/BindingState.name: unbound
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/BindingState.abstract: This is returned when tokenId is not bound with the device.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVSession.h.name: selectIDVMethod(_:completionHandler:)
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVSession.h.abstract: Based on selected IDVMethod, the corresponding verification flow will be triggered.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVSession.h.name: validateOTP(_:)
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVSession.h.abstract: Activates the binding with OTP. The TMGSDK will call the server to validate the OTP.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVMethod.ht.name: type
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVMethod.ht.abstract: The IDVMethod that the end user can select.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVMethod.ht.name: value
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVMethod.ht.abstract: An information that can be displayed to the end user.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVType.html.name: otpEmail
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVType.html.abstract: otpEmail is used when the end user opts for OTP through mail verification.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVType.html.name: otpSMS
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVType.html.abstract: otpSMS is used when the end user opts for OTP through SMS verification.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper.html#/s:6TMG.name: createBinding(forTokenID:correlationID:idvSessionHandler:deviceAuthenticationHandler:completionHandler:)
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper.html#/s:6TMG.abstract: This API binds the Mastercard token to the device.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVType.html.name: IDVType
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVType.html.abstract: The list of Identity and Verification method types in IDVType.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVMethod.ht.name: IDVMethod
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVMethod.ht.abstract: IDVMethod defines the Mastercard IDV method that is available to the end user.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVSession.h.name: IDVSession
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/IDVSession.h.abstract: IDVSession is used to get the available IDVMethod.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/TransactionC.name: TransactionContext
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper/TransactionC.abstract: TransactionContext defines the metadata for the transaction.

Classes/DeviceAuthentication.html#/s:6TM.name: isBiometricSupported
Classes/DeviceAuthentication.html#/s:6TM.abstract: Gets the biometric supporting status of the device.

Classes/DeviceAuthentication.html.name: DeviceAuthentication
Classes/DeviceAuthentication.html.abstract: DeviceAuthentication is used to authenticate the device.

Classes/MastercardTAFHelper.html.name: MastercardTAFHelper
Classes/MastercardTAFHelper.html.abstract: The MastercardTAFHelper class is used to bind the Mastercard provisioned token ID to the device and authenticate the transaction.

Classes/TMGClient.html.name: TMGClient
Classes/TMGClient.html.abstract: The TMGClient is used to create instances of VisaCTFHelper and MastercardTAFHelper.

Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html.name: TMGClientConfiguration
Classes/TMGClientConfiguration.html.abstract: TMGClientConfiguration used to configure the Server URL, Server certificate, Key identifier and Certificate pins

Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html.name: VisaCTFHelper
Classes/VisaCTFHelper.html.abstract: The VisaCTFHelper is used to bind the visa provisioned token ID to the device and authenticate the transaction.
